mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide unforgettable travel experiences in Uzbekistan
mission.textUz: O'zbekistonda unutilmas sayohat tajribalarini taqdim etish

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the leading travel agency in Central Asia
vision.textUz: Markaziy Osiyoda yetakchi sayohat agentligi bo'lish

description.title: Who We Are
description.text: Travel Bliss is a premier travel agency specializing in tours across Uzbekistan. With years of experience, we offer authentic cultural experiences, comfortable accommodations, and professional guides.
description.textUz: Travel Bliss - O'zbekiston bo'ylab sayohatlarga ixtisoslashgan yetakchi sayohat agentligi. Ko'p yillik tajribamiz bilan biz haqiqiy madaniy tajribalar, qulay turar joylar va professional gidlarni taklif qilamiz.

questions.question: How do I book a tour?
questions.answer: You can book a tour through our website by selecting your preferred tour and filling out the booking form. You can also contact us directly via phone or email.
questions.answerUz: Siz saytimiz orqali o'zingiz yoqtirgan turni tanlab, buyurtma formasini to'ldirish orqali tur buyurtma qilishingiz mumkin. Bundan tashqari, telefon yoki email orqali biz bilan to'g'ridan-to'g'ri bog'lanishingiz mumkin.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cash, bank transfers, and major credit cards. For international clients, we also accept PayPal and wire transfers.
questions.answerUz: Biz naqd pul, bank o'tkazmalari va asosiy kredit kartalarini qabul qilamiz. Xalqaro mijozlar uchun PayPal va bank o'tkazmalarini ham qabul qilamiz.

questions.question: What is included in the tour price?
questions.answer: Tour prices typically include accommodation, transportation, guide services, and entrance fees to attractions. Meals and personal expenses are usually not included unless specified.
questions.answerUz: Tur narxlariga odatda turar joy, transport, gid xizmatlari va diqqatga sazovor joylarga kirish to'lovlari kiradi. Ovqatlanish va shaxsiy xarajatlar, agar ko'rsatilmagan bo'lsa, odatda kirmaydi.

questions.question: Can I customize my tour?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer customized tour packages tailored to your preferences, schedule, and budget. Contact us to discuss your requirements.
questions.answerUz: Ha! Biz sizning xohishingiz, jadvalingiz va byudjetingizga moslashtirilgan maxsus tur paketlarini taklif qilamiz. Talablaringizni muhokama qilish uchun biz bilan bog'laning.

questions.question: Do I need a visa to visit Uzbekistan?
questions.questionUz: O'zbekistonga tashrif buyurish uchun viza kerakmi?
questions.answer: Many countries have visa-free access to Uzbekistan. Please check the visa requirements for your nationality on our Visa page or contact your local Uzbek embassy.
questions.answerUz: Ko'plab mamlakatlar O'zbekistonga vizasiz kirish huquqiga ega. Iltimos, o'z fuqaroligingiz uchun viza talablarini bizning Viza sahifamizda yoki mahalliy O'zbekiston elchixonangizda tekshiring.

intro.text: Uzbekistan welcomes visitors from around the world. Many countries enjoy visa-free access, while others can easily obtain an e-visa.
intro.textUz: O'zbekiston butun dunyo bo'ylab mehmonlarni qabul qiladi. Ko'plab mamlakatlar vizasiz kirish imkoniyatiga ega, boshqalar esa elektron vizani osonlik bilan olishlari mumkin.

eVisaInfo.title: E-Visa Information
eVisaInfo.text: Citizens of countries not in the visa-free list can apply for an e-visa online.
eVisaInfo.textUz: Vizasiz ro'yxatda bo'lmagan mamlakatlar fuqarolari onlayn elektron vizaga murojaat qilishlari mumkin.

requirements.title: Valid Passport
requirements.description: Passport must be valid for at least 3 months after your planned departure from Uzbekistan
requirements.descriptionUz: Pasport O'zbekistondan rejalashtirilgan jo'nab ketish sanasidan keyin kamida 3 oy amal qilishi kerak

requirements.title: Return Ticket
requirements.description: Proof of onward or return travel
